author: Ted Greenwald
title: IBM’s Fourth-Quarter Earnings: What to Watch
text:
International Business Machines Corp. is scheduled to announce fourth-quarter earnings after the market closes Thursday. Here’s what to look for:
EARNINGS FORECAST: Analysts expect IBM to report earnings of $5.17 a share on an adjusted basis, which typically omits items such as acquisition- and retirement-related charges, according to a survey by Thomson Reuters. A year ago, IBM reported $5.01 in adjusted profit.
...
